name: Thought Worm IV
text: This functions as per thought worm III, except that the penalty on Will saves is –6 and a target that succeeds at its Will save still takes a –3 penalty on Will saves against your mind-affecting spells and effects for the same duration. This spell can be undercast.
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则部分; 见文本
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同精神蛀虫III一般，除了目标的意志豁免减值改为-6，另外，目标在成功通过该法术意志豁免时，其意志豁免依然会在相同的持续时间内承受-3减值。该法术可以被降阶施法。
